title: Five-Star Slovenia Escape with Rooftop Restaurant & Bar
description: Discover the wonders of Slovenia's capital with a five-star stay at InterContinental Ljubljana, an IHG Hotel. Located minutes from the city's Old Town and the elegant greenery of Ljubljana Botanic Garden and Tivoli Castle, the modern hotel is the perfect base to discover the city. When you're not exploring local sights, treat yourself to complete relaxation at Serenity Wellness, take a dip in the indoor pool or head up to the rooftop B-Restaurant & Bar for global cuisine paired with glittering city views.
